name: SBAHJ theme
description:
There were two SBAHJ themes both had small issues so i basically combined codes to make the theme work better

Things I fixed:
-Made it so the tumblr logo was clickable
-Background now shows when you browse tags
-No blue parts
-Customizable font and color (font code is at the very bottom when editing the theme)
-New posts icons are fixed

Any feedback/ways I can fix more aspects of the theme? Send me an ask on my tumblr: harshwhimsy.tumblr.com/ask
